text:
PatternLayout-elements: %C %F %L %M give '?', %l produces an empty string.
The same PatternLayout will work with FileAppender and ConsoleAppender.
Tested under Linux (RedHat 7.1) and WinNT 4.0 SP5.
SUN-JDK 1.3.1
log4j-Version: 1.1.3
Compilation/JVM:
javac -g
java -Xint
creator: richard.mueller@bawag.com
